title: "Deep Learning May Help Diagnose MRI-Negative Epilepsy"
excerpt: "A deep learning algorithm successfully detected type II focal cortical dysplasia (FCD) in epilepsy patients initially diagnosed as MRI-negative, Canadian researchers said. The algorithm had a sensitivity in detecting FCD in MRI-negative patients of 85%,"
